title: Embark on your journey to healing and abundant energy
description: By combining counseling services with complementary alternative therapies, our approach helps realign the mind, body and spirit.
text:

Relaxing …… Nurturing….. Rejuvenating….Healing
BIOFIELD SCIENCE AND ENERGY HEALING
The future of medicine is light and energy
The science behind energy healing and biofield is emerging as a rich and fascinating healing approach for prevention, longevity and healing. Your body is more than a set of biochemical interactions. Even though it appears to be a material object, in reality is a field of energy, transformation, and intelligence. Vitality depend on maintaining the functional integrity of internal energetic system. Complementary to conventional medicine, energetic therapy is a proven practice of working with the body’s biofields, thereby to balance the function of the organs and transform physical, emotional, mental, and spiritual well-being. By raising our vibrational frequencies we can achieve an inner balance, experience joy, improve mental clarity and focus, heal past trauma, repair health and manage stress.
Brain Health Coaching
Imagine having the capacity to take charge of our emotions and liberate yourself from anxiety and emotional overwhelm at any moment.
When you tap into the needs of your unique body and into the vital force already inside, health and wellbeing are bound to occur! At blending the most cutting-edge scientific knowledge with profound spiritual wisdom, thoughts, beliefs, and lifestyle practices can improve for balance & harmony. Comprehensive, and Scientifically proven approaches such as EFT, Brain Spotting, Energy Therapies, Bioresonance, Inner Counseling, Medical Intuition, Nutrition, Neuroscience, Heart Coherence, as well as life style modification can help you find calm in any circumstance, increase your immunity, gain a renewed sense of vitality, clarity, and unconditional love to activate the power of your inner guidance.

Inner Wellness
Transformation through the surging power of your spirit.
We all have magnificent potentials coded within us, ready to be unleashed. Through spiritual accompaniment we can connect to our nobler and higher inner being. We can sustain a transformation process by releasing our true human potential essential for living a conscious, enlightened life aligned with our deeper purpose. We can realize this empowering life mastery together through mindfulness, meditation, and powerful guided imagery for a sense of connection to an enkindling spirit and a heart-filled radiant joy.

Let food be thy medicine and medicine thy food

lifestyle

BIORESONANCE Frequency THERAPIES
If you want to find the secrets of the universe, think in terms of energy, frequency and vibration.” Tesla
Isn’t a great
feeling to feel strong, focused, healthy, and vibrant. A healthy body and mind
means
a healthy and meaningful life after all.
Microcurrent is a revolutionary treatment that many consider a “new” approach to addressing chronic pain, anxiety and much more. The Healy is a small but very versatile device (controlled by your Apple or Android smartphone) that uses Individualized Microcurrent Frequency (IMF) programs to harmonize your Bioenergetic Field by resonance frequency.
This powerful cutting edge technology will help you to improve the flow of your energy reserves and activate your energy reservoir.
Workshop and Courses
This journey starts with you.
Weaving together cutting-edge science with wisdom from teachers of the world’s transformative traditions, this course explores how people experience deep shifts in their consciousness, and how those shifts can lead to healing and wellbeing.

My Story
My Story
My personal vision is to be an instrument of global healing, impacting lives
through the scientific lens of evidence-based approach honoring a holistic
view that spirituality is not just one dimension of human life; it is the
motivating impulse of existence for living a life of true meaning and purpose.
Traversing in a path of international travels to more than 30 countries and
numerous cities, towns and villages across the globe, I have learned that
regardless of our physical, racial, ethnic, religious, and social differences we
are powerful luminous beings and when our consciousness is heightened we
can see with new eyes and think with a new mind. We are interconnected
waves of one sea and all possess those molecules of kindness and that
kindness is contagious leading to regeneration of cells and global healing.
My work is dedicated to the spiritual giants, on whose shoulders I have stood throughout my life striving to emulate their world-embracing love, radical forgiveness, indomitable resilience, and exemplary thirst for learning and service.
About
About
Dr. Monireh (Moné) Ayoubzadeh is a visionary educator, speaker, avid
researcher with with more than 25 years of experience and training. A well-
being practitioner on both a micro and macro scale, she has pioneered the
study and application of integrating heart, mind and body with the surging
power of the spirit for life-changing optimization of health. For individuals,
she creates customized programs for personal well-being, empowering them
to foster their talents and strengths, to build awareness, transcend setbacks
in order to make significant positive changes in their lives and communities.
Dr. Ayoubzadeh uses her extensive trainings in natural health, psychology, biofield modalities, education, and transformative leadership, along with cutting edge bioenergetics technology to gain insight into the holistic health of the energetic body. This powerful approach harnesses the body’s innate healing power by activating the body’s own information and energy to restore itself. Gleaning from years of international philanthropic projects, work and studies, she continues to inspire others to unleash their highest potential, to celebrate the sacred beauty of life and to translate it into purposeful action.
Dr. Ayoubzadeh’s work is grounded in her passion and guided by her personal mission to serve, educate, and empower individuals toward a path of individual and social transformation which led to receiving many awards such as Iconic Women Creating a Better World for all in New Delhi, India.

Specialties
OUR PATIENTS SAY
Transformation through the growing power of your spirit.
Perceptive, soothing, distinct, truthful and sage-like, Monireh uses authenticity and dedication to deliver her consistent message of love, forgiveness and living your best life. She is an accomplished life coach, trainer, inspirational speaker and living testament to the value of transcending life’s tragedies and the power of acting on hope and faith. She has the innate ability to look deep inside people’s lives to see emotionally riveting factors where she blends spiritual and innovative scientific practices to help you discover the vast dimensions of inner depth and strength, bringing forth a longing for transformation which ultimately leads one to a richer, fuller, and more meaningful life. “Karie. San Francisco, CA”
Moné is an amazing, loving, perceptive, inspiring, and empowering practitioner. Her spirituality radiates which gives you sense of well-being in her presence. She helps you know yourself better and emphasizes your qualities not only to figure out with different “eye” no solutions for the difficult problems and challenges that arise in life but also to appreciate life. Her wisdom and guidance gives you the tools to connect with your mind, body, and spirit to be in perfect harmony. Thank you Moné, you are a blessing and a gift. “Gloria. San Diego, CA”
Sing-Up for a Free 15 Minute Consultation
You Have Already Begun Your Transformative Journey
